name: MINI WATER
description:
Mini Water Collector...!

One of the greatest fears of humanity is not having enough water needed for each home almost people do not attribute it to saving water, what is more, the environment is not even talked about, but the most affected are those who live in fields and there are some cities that do not normally have water, this leads humanity to have bottled water and at the same time increase the excess of plastics that go directly to rivers or lake.

FEATURES:

-The mini collector advances by itself.

-Has two movements (righ and left).

-Collect coins.

-Collect water.

-Avoid touching contamination.

-Avoid touching cones,

-Avoid touching trees and bushes.

Avoid touching contamination.
